description:
A different way of reading stories. Immerse yourself in the books and interact with them, with this installation you will be able to enjoy the adventure of Puss in Boots and the Marquis of Carabas. Simple and attractive, with full color illustrations and fun music. Drink a potion and change the language, learn while enjoying one of the best classic tales in the world.

• Full color illustrations
• Animated interactive book
• Fun music
• A story for the little ones
• Touch screen compatibility
name: Puss in Boots: Interactive Book
